title: Windows Server 2012 R2 VL ESD en-US June 2016 {Gen2}
description:
* Windows Server 2012 R2 VL ESD en-US June 2016


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: 2012.R2VL.ESD.ENU.June2016.iso
* Size: 4,56GB
* Format: Bootable ISO
   
* CRC32: a880e6a4
* MD5:	3c429716326a4bb17d79ed67c862cad7
* SHA-1: 1edbc93a7b2a373606b83608d2e4840bb152411c

[ Source ]

* en_windows_server_2012_r2_vl_with_update_x64_dvd_6052766

[ LANGUAGE ]
 
* en-US = English

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard Core 
* Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard
* Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter Core
* Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter

* Integrated / Pre-installed:

* Important & Security Updates - 2016-06-14

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* .NET Framework 4.6.1 (NDP461-KB3102436)
* KB3135998 
* KB3142036

[ FEATURES ]

* UEFI-ready 
* (Use attached Rufus USB-tool to make UEFI-bootable).
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ Activation instructions ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.  
* For activation, select "KMS" and click on "Begin Install".
* To skip activation, just click on "Exit".

[ SCREENSHOTS ]
[url]http://extraimago.com/image/aDx8[/url]

* Activator: KMS
* (Potential False Positive Virus Alarm!)  
 
[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB  (highly recommended) 
* with Rufus (attached) or burn to DVD-DL at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]
* ashish.k, milrob & stevie-boy for
* continued support & help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2
